remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會複製`count`位元組`src`，開始位置在`srcOffset`至`dst`，開始位置在`dstOffset`。This method copies `count` bytes from `src`, beginning at `srcOffset`, to `dst`, beginning at `dstOffset`. 兩者`srcOffset`和`dstOffset`以零為起始; 也就是說，每個緩衝區中的第一個位元組位於位置 0，不位置 1。Both `srcOffset` and `dstOffset` are zero-based; that is, the first byte in each buffer is at position 0, not position 1. 方法會存取中的位元組`src`參數使用位移到記憶體中，不程式設計建構，例如索引或上限和下限的陣列界限的陣列。The method accesses the bytes in the `src` parameter array using offsets into memory, not programming constructs such as indexes or upper and lower array bounds. 例如，如果您在您的應用程式的程式設計語言中宣告陣列以零為起始的下限，為-50，並接著將陣列和，位移為 5，以傳遞方法，此方法會存取的第一個陣列項目是第二個陣列，也就是索引-49 處的項目。For example, if in the programming language of your application you declare an array with a zero-based lower bound of -50, and then pass the array and an offset of 5 to the method, the first array element the method will access is the second element of the array, which is at index -49. 此外，存取哪一個位元組的陣列元素-49 首先取決於正在執行您的應用程式之電腦的位元組序。Furthermore, which byte of array element -49 is accessed first depends on the endianness of the computer that is executing your application. 正如其名，方法複製的位元組區塊為整體，而不是一次複製一個位元組。As its name suggests, the method copies a block of bytes as a whole, rather than copying one byte at a time. 因此，如果`src`並`dst`參考相同的陣列，以及介於`srcOffset` + `count` -1 會重疊，範圍是從`dstOffset` + `count` -1，重疊的值將它們複製到目的地之前，不會覆寫個位元組。Therefore, if `src` and `dst` reference the same array, and the range from `srcOffset` + `count` -1 overlaps the range from `dstOffset` + `count` - 1, the values of the overlapping bytes are not overwritten before they are copied to the destination. 在下列範例中，名為陣列中的 0 到 16 個位元組的值`arr`會複製到 12 月 28 日的位元組。In the following example, the values of bytes 0-16 in an array named `arr` are copied to bytes 12-28. 儘管重疊範圍，成功複製來源位元組的值。Despite the overlapping range, the values of the source bytes are successfully copied. [!code-cpp[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/CPP/overlap1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/CS/overlap1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/VB/overlap1.vb#3)] 在下列範例中，名為陣列中的位元組 12 月 28 日的值`arr`會複製到位元組 0-16。In the following example, the values of bytes 12-28 in an array named `arr` are copied to bytes 0-16. 同樣地，儘管重疊範圍，會成功會複製來源位元組的值。Again, despite the overlapping range, the values of the source bytes are successfully copied. [!code-cpp[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/CPP/overlap1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/CS/overlap1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/VB/overlap1.vb#4)] ## Examples 下列範例會將陣列區域複製使用方法。The following example copies regions of arrays by using the method. 每個作業，它會列出來源和目的陣列，這兩個陣列的值，並以一連串的位元組。For each operation, it lists the source and destination arrays as both an array of values and as a sequence of bytes. 此範例說明如何使用時，請考慮系統的位元組序的重要性方法： 因為 Windows 系統是位元組由小到大，基本資料類型值的低序位位元組前面的高序位位元組。The example illustrates the importance of considering a system's endianness when working with the method: Because Windows systems are little-endian, the lower-order bytes of a primitive data type's value precede the higher-order bytes.
